title: My launcher does nothing
body: My launch literally does nothing, the launcher button doesn't work, pressing repair doesn't do anything, i cant even change region someone please help because im not getting a reply from riot support. (and yes i have re installed the game, 3 times, i only fixes the problem for about 2 weeks)

replies.body:
Yes i have.....
Still waiting for a useful reply from riot on my ticket

If you don't use the "Reply" button to reply to comments, then the original poster won't get notification. That's why it took so long for me to finally backtrack and find this.

I'm very sorry that Riot Support haven't gotten back to you on this. When I presented them with a situation that was clearly a fault with the game's coding not gracefully devolving, they just said, "We've sent this to our tech guys. They'll get in touch with you soon." And they never did.

Have you tried waiting for over five minutes after you clicked the button, while in admin mode? Maybe it just needs to cache something, in which case waiting once will fix it forever (or at least, until it's deleted again).

Have you tried running the program in compatibility mode? If you're on Windows 8, try compatibility for Windows 7 (latest service pack), and then XP (latest service pack). There's no point in trying the others.
i ticket being open for a week, with little to no help, thats baaaad
Still yet to get help from my ticket
Still yet to get help from my ticket
Riot doesn't seem to give a shit about technical problems
I know this will seem silly, but have you tried running in admin mode?

Same issue. I scraped by before 5.8, but having to accept the EULA broke it entirely it seems. Sent a ticket into Riot and posted on the subreddit. Reinstalled the game and it won't start trying to install at all now.

i also have this issue, followed eu and na forums to try find a permenant fix but nothing works. Has been like this since 5.6 patch. And I have also not had any help from riot about this nor have they even responded to the post i left in the bugs/faults post they left for 5.6 and 5.7
i also took out a ticket that now has not been answered for about 9 hours, Yay riot!
